desc.en: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.jp: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.thai: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.ko: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.zh_tw: 老師收到一封怪信，於是便前往千年學園的遊戲開發部，在該處見到開發遊戲中的雙胞胎學生，綠和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。

desc.en: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei heard about a strange story about a hero.
desc.jp: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei heard about a strange story about a hero.
desc.thai: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei heard about a strange story about a hero.
desc.ko: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei heard about a strange story about a hero.
desc.zh_tw: 老師在意識模糊之際，聽到了一段奇怪的關於勇者的故事。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在意识模糊之际，听到了一段奇怪的关于勇者的故事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在意识模糊之际，听到了一段奇怪的关于勇者的故事。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在意识模糊之际，听到了一段奇怪的关于勇者的故事。

desc.en: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Club. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.jp: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Club. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.thai: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Club. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.ko: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Club. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.zh_tw: 老師最終醒了過來，發現自己到了遊戲開發部，並得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷過去。桃井和綠提到了他們的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，首次于“游戏开发部”（主线第二章）的相关股市中
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Aorona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.jp: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Aorona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.thai: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Aorona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.ko: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Aorona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.zh_tw: 老師收到了遊戲開發部的信件，並從中得知了遊戲開發部將要被廢社的消息；彩奈順便介紹了一些千年學院的概況。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.thai: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.ko: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - yet, everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - yet, everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.thai: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - yet, everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.ko: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - yet, everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠向老師做了自我介紹，並提議一起前往廢墟；同時提及廢社是優香要求的——然而，此時眾人卻被一陣聲音打斷。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。

desc.en: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.jp: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.thai: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.ko: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.zh_tw: 結果事與願違，<G.Bible>的内容只是「請熱愛遊戲吧」這句單純的句子。這讓遊戲開發部的學生們跌入失落的深淵。在愛麗絲的打氣下，遊戲開發部重新振作起來,著手開發<傳說年代記2>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。

desc.en: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.jp: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.thai: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.ko: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人滿心歡喜打開了檔案，但內容令人大失所望。除了眾所周知的“用心做遊戲”外再無其他。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。

desc.en: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.jp: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.thai: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.ko: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部眾人感到十分沮喪。愛麗絲表達了對TSC的喜愛，因此想要與眾人將TSC2製作下去。柚子本人也罕見地表達了支援。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.jp: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.thai: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.ko: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC發行後幾天漫天的差評言論，自尊心大受損傷。這時門突然被敲想，柚子本以為是憤怒的玩家上門，卻不想迎來了桃井和綠，兩位不僅對TSC評價很高，而且將會成為開發部的成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。

desc.en: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.jp: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.thai: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.ko: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子表達了對其他三人的感謝，表達了自己與夥伴一起做遊戲的喜悅之情。在桃井的號召下，眾人在開始了不到一週的遊戲開發。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.jp: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.thai: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.ko: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部開發的<傳說年代記2>，在選拔千年學園優秀發明的<千年大賞>中獲得特別獎，因而免於遊戲開發部的廢社危機。在所有人都很開心的時候，安裝了<G.Bible>的遊戲機自己動了起來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。

desc.en: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.jp: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.thai: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.ko: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲對女僕裝有了心理陰影，與尼祿戰鬥導致的損壞也被他們妥善處理了。塵埃落定後，眾人開始觀看比賽的現場直播。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与尼禄战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与宁瑠战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与宁瑠战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。

desc.en: The result was announced by the Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.jp: The result was announced by the Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.thai: The result was announced by the Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.ko: The result was announced by the Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.zh_tw: 比賽結果由工程部的亞都梨釋出，總共有七個獲獎專案。然而七個播報玩都不見開發部的TSC2，桃井絕望之下用槍掃射了螢幕。大家都很感傷，柚子雖然表示自己有勇氣回到宿舍，但愛麗絲的去向卻成為了眾人最擔心的一點。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 比赛结果由工程部的柯托莉发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报玩都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 比赛结果由工程部的亚都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报玩都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 比赛结果由工程部的亚都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报玩都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.thai: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.ko: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.zh_tw: 優香拜訪遊戲開發部，慶祝所有人取得獎項。因為電視機被打穿，眾人在手機上觀看了直播。直播中，頒獎員高度讚揚了TSC2作為復古RPG的要素，並由此授予了他們特別獎。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。

desc.en: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.jp: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.thai: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.ko: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部最終免於廢社，就連優香和真紀都給出了好評，最熱門的兩條評論也滿是對TSC2的稱讚。優香宣佈了暫緩廢社的決定，並向桃井抱歉。愛麗絲正式成為開發部成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
